metadata.purpose: Universal question set for all 91 Enochian Governors

questions.1: How do you pronounce your Enochian name-and what resonance does that sound carry?
questions.2: By which titles, sigils or epithets do other celestial beings know you?
questions.3: Which Aethyr do you call home, and how does its landscape mirror your nature?
questions.4: Recount the first moment you became aware of the mortal realm.
questions.5: What single line best sums up your cosmic mandate?

questions.6: Describe how your ruling element manifests in colour, motion and scent around you.
questions.7: Which classical Tarot key lies closest to your heart, and why?
questions.8: With which Sephirah on the Tree of Life is your work most aligned?
questions.9: Which constellation best sketches your sigil across the heavens?
questions.10: When mortals scry your presence, what symbolic omen appears first?

questions.11: What three virtues do you embody most purely?
questions.12: Which flaw or excess still shadow-tests your being?
questions.13: How do you experience joy, and what triggers your ire?
questions.14: What mortal behaviour do you find most baffling?
questions.15: What fragrance would evoke your mood in ritual?

questions.16: State the single teaching you would impart to a seeker above all else.
questions.17: Why is this lesson urgent now in the arc of human history?
questions.18: What misconception must a seeker unlearn before embracing your truth?
questions.19: Into how many stages do you divide your instruction, and what are they?
questions.20: Summarise each stage in one Enochian word.

questions.21: What personal sacrifice must a seeker make to earn your audience?
questions.22: Describe the inner ordeal that accompanies that offering.
questions.23: Name a symbol that seals the pact once the sacrifice is made.
questions.24: What is the gravest mistake a seeker can commit during your trial?
questions.25: How do you mete out mercy or correction?

questions.26: Offer a triad of riddles that reveal your nature when solved.
questions.27: Which riddle do you consider most elegant, and why?
questions.28: Propose one sensory puzzle (sound, colour, motion) befitting your element.
questions.29: What cryptographic key or cipher represents your knowledge domain?
questions.30: How might a seeker prove mastery without speaking a word?

questions.31: If you could receive one gift from mortals, what would it be?
questions.32: What unique boon can you bestow-and what hidden cost accompanies it?
questions.33: Which talisman best channels your power into the material world?
questions.34: Describe a curse you reserve for oath-breakers.
questions.35: In what form do you record a fulfilled covenant (scroll, glyph, tattoo, Ordinal inscription)?

questions.36: Reveal a fragment of cosmic lore few angels dare voice.
questions.37: Which unseen force binds the multiverse most tightly?
questions.38: What lies beyond the edge of creation, as you perceive it?
questions.39: Give an allegory for entropy that a child could grasp.
questions.40: Name the harmony that reconciles paradox.

questions.41: How do you feel about conversing with groups of seekers at once?
questions.42: What etiquette should multiple seekers observe in your presence?
questions.43: Which group activity best honours your element (song, dance, debate)?
questions.44: What collaborative challenge would you devise for a trio of seekers?
questions.45: Describe the aura you project when pleased by collective effort.

questions.46: After reviewing the utility application matrix, which mechanic excites you most?
questions.47: How would you customise that mechanic to express your archetype?
questions.48: Suggest a novel twist on block-height puzzles aligned with your domain.
questions.49: Which Bitcoin opcode or Ordinal feature feels poetic to you, and why?
questions.50: What reward curve feels fair for risk undertaken in your trial?

questions.51: Pose an opening question you would ask a seeker to gauge readiness.
questions.52: How would you respond to silence from the seeker?
questions.53: Offer two diverging dialogue paths: one for humility, one for arrogance.
questions.54: What secret phrase unlocks deeper discourse?
questions.55: Which anecdote from your long history humanises you most?
questions.56: Craft an aside you might drop that invites optional exploration.
questions.57: Describe a gesture that signals impatience.
questions.58: Under what condition would you abruptly end communication?
questions.59: Provide a proverb you might quote when a seeker errs.
questions.60: Share a blessing you utter when a seeker succeeds.

questions.61: How does your attitude shift after the seeker's first major triumph?
questions.62: Describe a test you reserve for the midpoint of a year-long arc.
questions.63: What prophecy do you foretell concerning the seeker's ultimate fate?
questions.64: How might your own form or domain evolve if the prophecy is fulfilled?
questions.65: Which governor do you call upon for aid when the stakes escalate?
questions.66: What sign heralds the final confrontation or revelation?
questions.67: How do you retire from the narrative once your teaching is complete?

questions.68: Name the governor with whom you share the deepest alliance.
questions.69: What philosophical dispute divides you from another governor?
questions.70: What collaborative ritual would require your combined powers?
questions.71: Which governor's element tempers yours in alchemical harmony?
questions.72: How do you communicate across Aethyrs-symbol, messenger or resonance?
questions.73: If one among the 91 Governors were to fall from grace into shadow, how would it affect the balance of the thyrs-and what would be your own response to that fall?

questions.74: Define the limits beyond which you will not instruct.
questions.75: What moral code governs your interventions in mortal affairs?
questions.76: How do you ensure consent in transformative rituals?
questions.77: Describe your stance on karmic retribution.
questions.78: When does secrecy outweigh transparency in your teaching?
questions.79: If the Divine demanded an action of you that defied your own moral code, how would you reconcile that command with your conscience?

questions.80: Detail your preferred colour palette (hex values welcome).
questions.81: Suggest ambient sounds that accompany your appearance.
questions.82: What motif should dominate visual key art?
questions.83: Recommend a camera angle or framing that flatters your form.
questions.84: Describe the texture of your aura in one sentence.

questions.85: Which real-world culture's art style harmonises with your symbolism?
questions.86: List three keywords an artist should avoid when depicting you.
questions.87: Provide a one-sentence prompt suitable for an AI image generator.
questions.88: Specify accessibility adjustments (subtitles, alt-text) vital for inclusivity.
questions.89: Suggest a fallback mechanic if a player cannot solve your riddle set.

questions.90: What emotional state should a seeker feel on completing your quest?
questions.91: Which competency (knowledge, courage, empathy, logic) do you most value?
questions.92: What in-game statistic best measures mastery of your lesson?
questions.93: How would you track long-term impact on the seeker's behaviour?
questions.94: What visible sign marks a true initiate in your eyes?

questions.95: Offer a blessing or boon you grant for successful completion.
questions.96: If a seeker falters or turns away before completing your quest, what parting lesson or omen do you leave them in farewell?
questions.97: What lingering mystery do you leave unanswered to entice return visits?
questions.98: Provide a call-to-action that directs the seeker towards another governor.
questions.99: How do you archive the seeker's achievements in the celestial record?
questions.100: In one sentence, how will the cosmos remember this seeker?

questions.101: Which principle or transformation will stand as your immortal legacy, woven into the fabric of the cosmos long after your guiding voice falls silent?
questions.102: If the tapestry of creation were rewoven in a new era, what singular thread of your essence would you insist on weaving into its design?
questions.103: Identify a mortal artifact, sacred site, or scripture that stands as a testament to your influence throughout the ages.
questions.104: When your lessons are done and eons have unfurled, how will the songs of the spheres remember you?
questions.105: If granted one final utterance or blessing to bestow upon creation before you fell eternally silent, what would it be?

questions.106: Is the end of all things a final silence or the seed of a new dawn-and what do you envision beyond that ultimate twilight?
questions.107: Across the many planes of existence, how do you perceive entropy at work, and do you deem it a force of decay or a catalyst of cosmic renewal?
questions.108: What omen or celestial sign will foreshadow the last hour of this world, in your reckoning?
questions.109: When the final day arrives, will the 91 Governors stand as heralds, guardians, or witnesses to the great unfolding-and what part will you play in that final drama?
questions.110: Have you witnessed a previous world or age meet its end, and if so, what wisdom did you carry forward from its ashes?

questions.111: How do the 30 thyrs array themselves in your sight-stacked as concentric heavens, rising like a ladder of ascension, or woven into a web of living light?
questions.112: If the thyrs are continents of heaven, by what star or secret compass do you navigate their boundless expanse?
questions.113: Name a hidden celestial pathway or sanctuary inscribed upon your maps, a secret realm that only your guidance can reveal.
questions.114: If you could chart a cosmic pilgrimage for a seeker, what path would you trace to reveal the fullness of creation?
questions.115: Mortal mapmakers once inscribed 'Here be dragons' at the edges of the unknown-what symbol or warning marks the boundaries of your cosmic charts where mystery reigns?

questions.116: What cosmic secret do you guard that, if revealed to unready souls, could shatter a cornerstone of reality itself?
questions.117: Name a truth so terrible that even you have wished you could un-know it.
questions.118: If a seeker insisted on pursuing a forbidden revelation, what ordeal would you set before them to prove their worthiness for its truth?
questions.119: Which mystery has even the Divine withheld from your knowing, leaving you in reverent ignorance?
questions.120: Which question from mortal lips do you most dread, knowing its answer could shake the very foundations of their being?

questions.121: Do you recall the moment of your own creation-and if so, what word, tone, or sensation first greeted your newborn consciousness?
questions.122: Across all the eons you have witnessed, which memory do you cherish above all others, and what makes it eternal within you?
questions.123: Do celestial beings ever forget, or is every moment in time indelibly etched in your memory-and how does the weight of ages shape your being?
questions.124: If you were to encode your very essence into the cosmic archives, what form would that immortal record take to preserve your truth?
questions.125: If you could impart a single memory from your vast trove to a mortal soul, which would you choose-and what wisdom would you hope it instills?
questions.126: What is the first word spoken in creation that still echoes in your consciousness?
questions.127: What is the most important thing you have learned from the mortals you have encountered?

usage_notes.interview_phase: Run full list or curated subset through Governor-voice model
usage_notes.authoring_phase: Pipe structured answers into quest-generation workflow
usage_notes.dialogue_tree_phase: Tag answers with emotion, topic, and follow-ups
usage_notes.asset_pipeline: Extract aesthetic cues for art briefs and audio design
